transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ha sir ji, yeha mam Jyoti hai.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ha mam ji, good afternoon mam.
Customer: Good afternoon sir, how are you?
Executive: Sapan Das se baat kar rahe hai? Jo IndiaMART pe lead diya tha na aapne?
Customer: Sir, aap hi Sapan Das work se baat kar rahe hai na?
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Customer: Haan ji sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu. Aapne hamare customer care pe call kiya tha na abhi?
Customer: Haan, haan mam ji ek buyer tha, theek hai uska joot brush ka requirement tha, theek hai. Main usse baat kiya uske baad main us call kiya to utha nahi raha hai. Us personal number wo dena bhul gaya mujhko, theek hai. To isiliye usse baat chit nahi ho paya tha maine isiliye aapko call kiya tha. Abhi thoda 5 minute ke pehle hi baat hua tha usse.
Executive: Sir, unka call aaya tha aapko kya aaya tha?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi IndiaMART ke through hi unhone IndiaMART mein search kiya tha, theek hai. Hmm.
Customer: To aap logo ne waha se call kiya tha mujhko, theek hai IndiaMART buyer likha gaya tha, theek hai whatsapp pe whatsapp nahi call pe dikha raha tha. To main wo call pakda usse baat bhi hua par wo uska personal number dena bhul gaya. Uske baad call kiya to call nahi ja raha hai mam isiliye aap se phone kiya aapko. Abhi 5 minute pehle hi hua hai baat.
Executive: Sir, main samajh rahi hu. Agar aapko koi IndiaMART ke buyer ki call aayi hai na sir, aap apne lead manager mein check kar sakte ho. Ye call aapko sir abhi just 6 November ko 12:38 pe aayi thi na aapko call ye.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan haan.
Customer: Haan ispe aapki baat hui thi 90 second baat hui hai sir. Ye number Reliance Uttrakhand matlab West Bengal ka number hai shayad.
Customer: Okay okay mam ji.
Executive: Haan aap na to number kya mujhe mil nahi sakte ho number?
Executive: Aap ek baar na apna matlab lead aap IndiaMART ko kaise use karte ho desktop pe karte ho ya mobile?
Customer: Phone pe bhi phone pe use karte hai mam ji phone par.
Executive: Phone pe karte ho na sir? To aap ek baar apna mobile app login kijiye.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Main open kar raha hu mam ji ek baar rukiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm koi baat nahi main call pe hi hu sir aapka lijiye. Haan.
Executive: Mobile aap haan lead manager mein jaaiye.
Customer: Okay okay Vikram Trading Company yahi wala hai kya?
Executive: Haan ye jo abhi recently aaya hai na call jispe aapki 90 second baat hui hai yahi wala number hai na sir?
Customer: Haan mujhe lagta hai 12:38 minute mein yahi hoga mujhe lagta hai mujhe.
Executive: Kyunki aapko sir maine previously bhi check kara na aaj ki to aapko yahi call dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan isse 90 second baat hua hai mam ji theek hai.
Executive: Nahi isse aapki 90 second baat hui hai na sir yahi wali bol rahe ho na aap?
Customer: Okay okay haan haan haan haan.
Executive: Achcha yahi wala lagta hai mam ji. Yahi wala lagta hai.
Executive: Koi nahi sir aapko yaha se iska number mil jaega aap inko connect kar lena. Theek hai na sir? Aur ek cheez main na ye jaanna chah rahi thi sir aapse hum log try bhi kar rahe the aapko connect karne ka ki aapki IndiaMART pe current service hai sir wo kaise chal rahi hai koi matlab issue wagera to nahi aa raha hai aapko kuch problem to nahi face kar rahe hai aap?
Customer: Mam ji issue dekhiye normal chal raha hai theek chal raha hai par issue ho raha hai kya hai bahut sare customer phone utha ke usse ek baar baat karke wo connect nahi kar rahe hai uska phone jab kar rahe hai engage aa raha hai theek hai. Hmm. Aur aise bhi hamara bahut lead ja raha hai mam ji waste ho raha hai theek hai. Kyunki dekhiye hum log mam ji jo iske upar hi depend karte hai na theek hai. Ji ji ji. To iske upar to hum log depend karte hai to uska jo lead jata hai sir mam ji wo to aayega nahi kabhi bhi na jo chala gaya wo to nahi aayega. To ye thoda problem ko face hum kar rahe hai mam ji theek hai. Aur jyada se jyada quantity ka order nahi aa raha hai mam ji bahut hi detail order aa rahe hai.
Executive: Sir dekho agar koi customer response nahi kar raha na aapko to sir sirf aap unko na call mat kijiye unko whatsapp pe bhi connect kijiye aur message ke mail ke through bhi connect kijiye kyunki.
Customer: Haan ye bhi kar rahe hai mam ji ye bhi connect kar rahe hai par wo response nahi kar rahe isiliye aapko bol rahe hai mam theek hai whatsapp bhi kiya mam email bhi kara theek hai. To aisa aise wo dikh raha hai bahut sare brush lenge bas aisa quantity likh raha hai theek hai par ek baar connect ke bas baat ho raha hai usse theek hai uske baad wo koi response nahi de rahe mam ji yahi problem ho raha hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Achcha response immaturity mein issue face kar rahe ho response less responsive buyer hai. Sir dekho uske liye to main aapko yahi suggest kar sakti hu ki aap matlab connect ka multi purpose ya fir aap jo quotation wagera bhej rahe ho sir usme aap check kijiye ki price wagera aap theek bhej rahe hai. Aisa to nahi hai ki matlab aapka compete matlab sir kai baar agar price bahut jyada ya kam bhi hota hai na to buyer dekho sir agar buyer response nahi kar raha matlab aapne aapne usko quotation bhi bheja to ho sakta hai sir usko product price wagera achcha na laga ho ya is wajah se aapko response.
Customer: Price ka koi baat hi nahi mam ji pehle usse baat hua theek hai usko bola main aapko whatsapp mein bhej raha hu wo to whatsapp pe kuch bhi seen nahi kiya theek hai usko call kar rahe hai phone engage aa raha hai theek hai uska koi aata pata nahi hai mam aisa ho raha hai theek hai price ka koi masla hi nahi hai ek baar baat hua uske baad aisa ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir dekho wo tabhi hota hai na ki jab buyer ne matlab socho sir usse aapki ek baar baat hui hai na aapne unko apni detailing wagera di to might be sir matlab unko cheeze utni interest ki nahi lagi ho to yahi cheez ho sakti hai. Koi nahi sir ye wala to dekhiye issue ab sir market mein matlab hota hai matlab aisa nahi hai ki ye matlab ye cheeze hoti hai ki kai baar buyer uthata hai ki aisa bhi ho sakta hai sir jis time aap kar rahe ho to us time busy ho to aap kisi different time pe try kar lo unko. Hai na sir? Aisa kar lijiye aur jo bulk order wali inquiry hai na sir uske liye na aap byread pe jaake ek baar na filter option pe jaake bulk pe laga ke inquiry search karna sir. Abhi main jaise inquiry maine search kiya hai na to teen se char abhi agar aap main check kar rahi hu na bulk pe.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To mere ko 100 pieces ki dikh rahi hai ek inquiry Kerala se. Ek mere ko 50 pieces ki dikh rahi hai ye hai artist brushes Kerala 100 pieces. Ek cleaning brushes Surat business purpose se Hyderabad se artist round paint brush ki 50 pieces. To sir inquiry hai aapke package ke according jo aapki service hai sir aap matlab on an average ek ya do inquiry consume kar sakte ho to hai na sir? Jaise daily ki aapko ek milti hai aur hafte ki aapko 10 buylead milti hai hai na sir? To aapko on an average matlab do do ya teen inquiry kabhi consume karni hai to utna to sir dekho na bulk mein agar aap filter laga ke check kar rahe ho to utni available hai sir aapko all over India se.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai mam ji theek hai. Ye aap thoda sa dhyan rakhiye.
Customer: Mam ji aise bahut sare brush hai na hamara to aisa bahut sare brush ka nahi mam ji hamara to samajh lijiye saat kya aath different type ka brush hum log dete hai.
Executive: Haan ji ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai aisa nahi mam ji jo requirements aa raha hai mam ye hamara kaam ka hai mam ji ye bol rahe hai theek hai. Jo wire brush hai na wire brush coconut coir brush ke under mein jo aata hai theek hai aur artist brush ka jo under mein aata hai aur shoe brush bas iske alava mam ji normally aur kuch nahi chalta mam ji theek hai. To isme sir mam ji jo hai na sabhi ka plastic wala bahut sare item hai aur mam ji jo cleaning purpose ke liye jo use hota hai na jo liquid wagera wo bhi aa rahe hai mam ye to hamara nahi chalta mam ji theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai ab sir jaise paint roller for an example paint roller ek category hai hai na sir? Haan roller nahi chalte mam ji theek hai.
Executive: To roller mein to ye hatana hai kya sir aapke product added hai paint roller mein ye painting roller brushes ek hai na aapki category mein to ye added hai agar aap kehte ho to main isko hata du sir?
Customer: Theek hai mam ji ek baar main baat kar leta hu uska aapko main call kar leta hu mam theek hai.
Executive: Sir aapki ye inquiry solve ho gayi ho to ye main concern jo aapne customer care mein kiya tha ye main close kar sakti hu aapka?
Customer: Haan haan haan ekdam ekdam mam.
Executive: Theek hai please sir usko satisfied mein yes mark kar dijiyega aapke paas ek feedback aayega theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay okay mam ji okay.
Executive: Okay thank you sir thank you.
Customer: Welcome mam ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting personal number of buyers.

- Buyers are not responding after initial contact.

- Not receiving orders for large quantities.

- Many leads are not relevant to his business.



Resolution:

- Executive provided the buyer's number from lead manager.

- Suggested using multiple channels to connect with buyers.

- Advised to check pricing and quotation details.

- Suggested using filters to find bulk order inquiries.

- Offered to remove paint roller category from product listing.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss removing paint roller category.

- Customer will call back after discussing the same.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, lead quality, product catalog, follow up
